text: @HillaryClinton Likely vulnerable groups will die COVID-19 contracted. End of story. Long term, most everyone in US will have been exposed, sick and recovered, died or taken a vaccine. If @realDonaldTrump had not been aggressive in pushing restart, No USA to recover Probs you couldn't imagine
